name: Chatrix
description: Chatrix is a decentralized communication protocol and messenger application that allows users to create blockchain-based identities through EVM wallets, exchange encrypted messages, and transfer cryptocurrencies directly inside chats. Unlike traditional messengers, Chatrix is designed to work even without internet by leveraging mesh networking technologies, ensuring unstoppable communication. Its native token, $CRX, powers the ecosystem, enabling utility, incentives, and long-term sustainability.
